summary: Most love stories are about losing love or finding it. This is a story about what happens in between.
cast: Josh Pence|Spencer Grammer|Nate Corddry|Bonnie Swencionis|Tom Bloom|John Forest|Melissa Rauch|Brian Avers|Andrea Barnes|Alec Beard|Andrea Bordeaux|David Conley|Mary Dorn|Blue Ferdinand|Nick Gehlfuss|Will Greenberg|Betty Hudson|Sondra James|Marcie Jean|Anthony Lumia|Kevin Martin|Leslie Meisel|Shanga Parker|Andy Ridings|Jay Russell|Jordan Santoro|Maite Schwartz|Peggy J. Scott|Charles Socarides|Theresa Walsh|Paige Whitebread|Lia Yang
title: In Lieu of Flowers
